name: luis barreto
tagline: getting acquainted with git and jekyll
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub  

Experienced professional with over 10 years as System Administrator; Data Center & Infrastructure Manager in sectors like Retail, Software, Banking, Wholesale, Telecom, Textiles and K-12 Schools.

Particularly interested in fast paced environment companies and challenging projects.
Highly responsible, ethical and professional attitude.

### Technical expertise (by day):  
- Windows/Linux; Active Directory; Email Infrastructure; Backup Tools (EMC Retrospect/ARCServer/HP DataProtector); Networking; VPN (OpenVPN/pfSense/HW appliances); (Cyber)Security;  
- Monitoring with Zenoss, Zabbix, Nagios, and cloud based solutions;  
- Ticketing systems and ITIL orientation;  
  
I strive to listen, learn and lead the change.
  
  
### Geek expertise (by night):
- Love Ubiquitous computing;
- Physical computing;
  
  
### Personal projects 
  
- A Wireless Sensor Network for Data Center monitoring. Data integration with Node-RED and visualization using Hughcharts API.
- A WordClock with a Portuguese clockface
- A binary clock with Arduino
  
----
  
  
### Author
